Package com.example.finding_tory

Class FirestoreDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.finding_tory.FirestoreDB
public class FirestoreDB extends Object
FirestoreDB is a utility class that provides access to Firebase Firestore database instances and references. It offers static methods to retrieve the Firestore database instance and specific collection references within the database.

  • Constructor Details

      public FirestoreDB()

  • Method Details

    • getDb

      public static com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore getDb()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of FirebaseFirestore. This method provides a central point of access to the Firebase Firestore database.
      Returns:
      The FirebaseFirestore instance.

    • getUsersRef

      public static com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference getUsersRef()
      Retrieves a reference to the 'users' collection in Firebase Firestore. This collection is used to store and manage user-related data in the database.
      Returns:
      A CollectionReference pointing to the 'users' collection in Firestore.

    • getInventoriesRef

      public static com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference getInventoriesRef(String username)
      Retrieves a reference to the 'inventories' collection of a specific user in Firebase Firestore. This collection is nested within the 'users' collection and is used to store and manage inventory-related data for each user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username identifying the specific user.
      Returns:
      A CollectionReference pointing to the 'inventories' collection of the specified user in Firestore.

    • getItemsRef

      public static com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference getItemsRef(String username, Inventory inventory)
      Retrieves a reference to the 'items' collection in Firebase Firestore. This collection is used to store and manage item-related data in the database.
      Returns:
      A CollectionReference pointing to the 'items' collection in Firestore.

    • deleteItemDB

      public static void deleteItemDB(String username, Inventory inventory, Item item)
      Deletes an item from the Firestore database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username identifying the specific user.
      inventory - The Inventory from which to delete the item.
      item - The Item to be deleted.

    • editItemFromFirestore

      public static void editItemFromFirestore(String username, Inventory inventory, Item existingItem)
      Edits an item in Firestore by set method which overwrites the existing data
      Parameters:
      username - The username identifying the specific user.
      inventory - The Inventory containing the item to be edited.
      existingItem - The existing item to be edited.

    • isDebugMode

      public static boolean isDebugMode()
      Getter method for debug mode
      Returns:
      debugMode
